org.jetel.data.parser

Class CharByteInputReader.RobustInputReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.parser.CharByteInputReader
      • org.jetel.data.parser.CharByteInputReader.RobustInputReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharByteInputReader
    Enclosing class:
    CharByteInputReader

    public static class CharByteInputReader.RobustInputReader
extends CharByteInputReader
    This implementation of the input reader should be used as last resort when none of the implementations above can be used That means it can be used for multiple byte charsets on inputs combining char-based and byte-based data fields. NOTE! Unpredictable behaviour should be expected for charsets with a CharsetDecoder maintaining internal state
